info.title: My Application
info.description:
../../babeltemplates/error.babel:



 Babel's Error Format

 Copyright (C) 2015 The Babel Authors

Generated on Fri, 24 Aug 2018 21:42:46 EDT via:

	babel2swagger "../../babeltemplates/error.babel"

Error.description:
Error defines a single error message and code that might be localized
 and displayed to a caller.

Message.description: The text of the error in US-English

Params.description:
The list of parameters to the error message. This could be used by
 localization systems to generate messages based on the error code.

ServiceError.description: ServiceError defines the error response generated by Babel for service failures

Context.description: Context is a map of additional error details and context

Details.description:
Details contains optional detailed error information, such as error messages
 or a stack trace specific to the given server environment

Errors.description: A list of errors that occurred

Inner.description: Inner points to a service error propagated from another tier that is using Babel
